# Errores con glance

[TOC]

## Entorno

Host | Mangement Network ( 172.16.172.0/24 ) | External Network ( 84.124.37.64/26 ) | Data Network | Storage Network 
---- | ------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------ | ---------------
controller01 | 172.16.172.201 | 84.124.37.67 | - | - 
network01 | 172.16.172.201 | - | | -
storage01 | 172.16.172.205 | - | - |
computo01 | 172.16.172.1 | - | |

## End Points

```
                id                |   region  |                  publicurl                  |                 internalurl                 |                   adminurl                  |            service_id            
----------------------------------|-----------|---------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------|----------------------------------
 0b2ff7fd10e646cb931c1057dafce2db | RegionOne |  http://84.124.37.67:8774/v2/$(tenant_id)s  | http://172.16.172.201:8774/v2/$(tenant_id)s | http://172.16.172.201:8774/v2/$(tenant_id)s | edfb8a430059474787e93fc2bd4bd082 
 303aeb3c71804a8bb6fcac72a160ecfe | RegionOne |          http://84.124.37.67:9696/          |         http://172.16.172.201:9696/         |         http://172.16.172.201:9696/         | e44c6aa234fb4eb398af23435cd9218e 
 32393b8635394981b2c0638e943e6986 | RegionOne | http://172.16.172.205:8776/v1/$(tenant_id)s | http://172.16.172.205:8776/v1/$(tenant_id)s | http://172.16.172.205:8776/v1/$(tenant_id)s | 3acf3a3b7e624aa7bfb73d82765664f0 
 79ed83f6695b4ce39cec4649171425f0 | RegionOne |   http://84.124.37.67:8773/services/Cloud   |  http://172.16.172.201:8773/services/Cloud  |  http://172.16.172.201:8773/services/Admin  | 6337b9a31f5546c884ebf479950a4e88 
 f54115e45b1c43cda35706c81907e91d | RegionOne |        http://172.16.172.205:9292/v2        |        http://172.16.172.205:9292/v2        |        http://172.16.172.205:9292/v2        | 49a2e3f43db0401980929c30854ce559 
 fc2d3e669c8748bba4f7ac1b129af548 | RegionOne |        http://84.124.37.67:5000/v2.0        |       http://172.16.172.201:5000/v2.0       |       http://172.16.172.201:35357/v2.0      | 8ecb29605d6045cb8bdf0c3bf782246a 
```


El problema está que `nova image-list` no funciona, mientras que `glance index` sí.

```
root@controller01:~# glance index
ID                                   Name                           Disk Format          Container Format     Size          
------------------------------------ ------------------------------ -------------------- -------------------- --------------
acd2be5a-b741-4639-ad5f-a575d27c5695 myFirstImage                   qcow2                bare                        9761280
```

* Dicha imagen se creo con la siguiente instrucción:

```
root@storage01:~# glance image-create --name myFirstImage --is-public true --container-format bare --disk-format qcow2 --location https://launchpad.net/cirros/trunk/0.3.0/+download/cirros-0.3.0-x86_64-disk.img
+------------------+--------------------------------------+
| Property         | Value                                |
+------------------+--------------------------------------+
| checksum         | None                                 |
| container_format | bare                                 |
| created_at       | 2013-05-28T11:05:44                  |
| deleted          | False                                |
| deleted_at       | None                                 |
| disk_format      | qcow2                                |
| id               | acd2be5a-b741-4639-ad5f-a575d27c5695 |
| is_public        | True                                 |
| min_disk         | 0                                    |
| min_ram          | 0                                    |
| name             | myFirstImage                         |
| owner            | e110d39b0818488fb15ad1b50283a28b     |
| protected        | False                                |
| size             | 9761280                              |
| status           | active                               |
| updated_at       | 2013-05-28T11:05:44                  |
+------------------+--------------------------------------+
```

Ejecutando `nova image-list`:

```
root@controller01:~# nova image-list
ERROR: The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-42c3155e-f2c6-4f9d-9782-74dc0fd20a79)
```

* El _openrc_ `root@controller01:~# cat openrc `:

```
export OS_TENANT_NAME=admin
export OS_USERNAME=admin
export OS_PASSWORD=secrete
export OS_AUTH_URL="http://172.16.172.201:5000/v2.0/"
export SERVICE_ENDPOINT="http://172.16.172.201:35357/v2.0"
export SERVICE_TOKEN=0c48647ad2eb2f1e2e14a5c4
```

## Un poco de Debug:

Voy a ver que diferencias encuetro entre `glance index` y `nova image-list`

### _nova image-list_

* Lo primero mostrar `nova list`:

```
root@controller01:~# nova list; echo $?

0
root@controller01:~# nova list && echo "ok" || echo "no ok"

ok
```

```
root@controller01:~# nova --debug list
```

```
root@controller01:~# curl -i http://172.16.172.205:9292/v2/images -X GET -H "X-Auth-Project-Id: admin" -H "User-Agent: python-novaclient" -H "Accept: application/json" -H "X-Auth-Token: MIILDgYJKoZIhvcNAQcCoIIK--umMKGN17yrNUkYT1QCRqOfiaQAX9A3LPmJOSjbDpIgArHXuYl4367g8aXQ7DqsuhxBsLighA+5AoX5zFwI8Ho7tk5z8Erv5SjC9+DX4vwTxmGJkpQvQiwYffe8RdeFOPJYGEoAAbO6o1Tmb2x--8iqf94chp4E="

Me devuelve la imagen que hay.

```
{"images": [{"status": "active", "name": "myFirstImage", "tags": [], "container_format": "bare", "created_at": "2013-05-28T11:05:44Z", "disk_format": "qcow2", "updated_at": "2013-05-28T11:05:44Z", "visibility": "public", "self": "/v2/images/acd2be5a-b741-4639-ad5f-a575d27c5695", "protected": false, "id": "acd2be5a-b741-4639-ad5f-a575d27c5695", "file": "/v2/images/acd2be5a-b741-4639-ad5f-a575d27c5695/file", "min_disk": 0, "size": 9761280, "min_ram": 0, "schema": "/v2/schemas/image"}], "schema": "/v2/schemas/images", "first": "/v2/images"}
```

Vamos que eso es el _glance index_.

## Primer Error Encontrado:

Un error en el _nova.conf_

```
# Imaging service
glance_api_servers=172.16.172.205:9292
image_service=nova.image.glance.GlanceImageService
```

Estaba mal puesto `glance_api_servers` en vez de la `.205` estba puesta la `.203` ahora ya dice otra cosa, aunque sigue petando.

```
root@controller01:~# nova --debug image-list

REQ: curl -i http://172.16.172.201:5000/v2.0/tokens -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/json" -H "User-Agent: python-novaclient" -d '{"auth": {"tenantName": "admin", "passwordCredentials": {"username": "admin", "password": "secrete"}}}'

INFO (connectionpool:191) Starting new HTTP connection (1): 172.16.172.201
DEBUG (connectionpool:283) "POST /v2.0/tokens HTTP/1.1" 200 6285
RESP: [200] {'date': 'Mon, 03 Jun 2013 14:27:19 GMT', 'content-type': 'application/json', 'content-length': '6285', 'vary': 'X-Auth-Token'}

* Para que todo vuelva a su ser y borrar todas las variables de entorno meto un __reboot__ al _controller_ y al _storage_ `...`

```
root@controller01:~# nova image-list
+--------------------------------------+--------------+--------+--------+
| ID                                   | Name         | Status | Server |
+--------------------------------------+--------------+--------+--------+
| acd2be5a-b741-4639-ad5f-a575d27c5695 | myFirstImage | ACTIVE |        |
+--------------------------------------+--------------+--------+--------+
```

El error era mucho más básico de lo que me temía, bueno, ahora a ver si tira.
